changeSet.author: jkondrat
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM geocoding_result gr WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT gr.id, Row_number() OVER ( partition BY address ORDER BY id DESC) FROM geocoding_result gr LEFT JOIN location_geocoding_results lgr ON lgr.geocoding_results_id = gr.id WHERE location_id IS NULL) duplicates WHERE duplicates.row_number > 1);
